snippet.title: Adventure Bit - First gameplay video!
snippet.description:
These are the first levels of Adventure Bit where you see some gameplay mechanics about the game. Adventure Bit is an indie game for PC inspired by MSX era!
You can add in wishlist Adventure Bit on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1460050/Adventure_Bit/
Here for all our games: https://store.steampowered.com/developer/seep
Thank you for watched the video! ^^
